item.title: Zermatt, Switzerland (video)
item.description:
Jon & I recorded a few video clips whilst we were in Zermatt, and I stuck them together to make the video above. (sorry about the youtube music…)

You can see all our photos from the trip here and here.

S. xo

item.title: Long overdue
item.description:
Here’s a long overdue video made up of a few video clips we took whilst in the US…

Now I just need to upload the video of the drive of the Pacific Coast Highway, hopefully not another year later this time!

S.
